languages.text: {n}Ксиони едва касается ладони мужа, ободряюще кивает ему, а затем обращается к вам:{/n} "В знак глубочайшего почтения к династии фон Валанциус позвольте преподнести вам скромную семейную реликвию клана Эрэбис — пусть служит вам верно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксиони Эрэбис едва касается ладони мужа, ободрительно кивает ему, а затем обращается к вам:{/n} "В знак глубочайшего почтения к династии фон Валанциус позвольте преподнести вам скромную семейную реликвию дома Эрэбис — пусть служит вам верно".

languages.text: {n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you:{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for the von Valancius dynasty, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксиони едва касается ладони мужа, ободряюще кивает ему, а затем обращается к вам:{/n} "В знак глубочайшего почтения к династии фон Валанциус позвольте преподнести вам скромную семейную реликвию клана Эрэбис — пусть служит вам верно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, nods at him reassuringly, then addresses you.{/n} "In token of our greatest reverence for House von Valancius, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

{n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, nods at him reassuringly, then addresses you.{/n} "In token of our greatest reverence for House von Valancius, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

{n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you.{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for House von Valancius, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

{n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you.{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for House von Valancius, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

{n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you:{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for the von Valancius dynasty, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

{n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you:{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for the von Valancius dynasty, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

languages.text: {n}Xioni effleure la paume de son mari et lui adresse un signe de tête rassurant avant de se tourner vers vous :{/n} « En témoignage de notre gratitude et de notre loyauté envers la dynastie von Valancius, permettez-moi de vous offrir une modeste relique familiale du clan Erebis. Qu'elle vous soit fidèle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you:{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for the von Valancius dynasty, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xioni effleure la paume de son mari et lui adresse un signe de tête rassurant avant de se tourner vers vous :{/n} « En témoignage de notre gratitude et de notre loyauté envers la dynastie von Valancius, permettez-moi de vous offrir une modeste relique familiale du clan Erebis. Qu'elle vous soit fidèle. »

languages.text: {n}Xioni toca suavemente la palma de su marido, asiente para animarle y te dirige la palabra:{/n} «Como muestra de nuestro máximo respeto por la dinastía von Valancius, permítame que le entregue una humilde reliquia familiar del clan Erebis. Espero que le sirva fielmente».
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you:{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for the von Valancius dynasty, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xioni toca suavemente la palma de su marido, asiente para animarle y te dirige la palabra:{/n} «Como muestra de nuestro máximo respeto por la dinastía von Valancius, permítame que le entregue una humilde reliquia familiar del clan Erebis. Espero que le sirva fielmente».

languages.text: {n}シオニは夫の手のひらにそっと触れて、安心させるようにうなずき、それからこちらに話しかける。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝へ最大の敬意の印として、エレビス家のささやかな遺物を贈らせてください。 あなた様のお役に立ちますように」
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you:{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for the von Valancius dynasty, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

traits.locale_text: {n}シオニは夫の手のひらにそっと触れて、安心させるようにうなずき、それからこちらに話しかける。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝へ最大の敬意の印として、エレビス家のささやかな遺物を贈らせてください。 あなた様のお役に立ちますように」

languages.text: {n}肖妮轻轻碰了碰她丈夫的手掌，宽慰地点点头，之后对你开了口。{/n}“为了表达我们对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝最崇高的敬意，请允许我献给您一件来自伊雷比斯氏族的小小圣物，愿它能忠实地为您服务。”
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you:{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for the von Valancius dynasty, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

traits.locale_text: {n}肖妮轻轻碰了碰她丈夫的手掌，宽慰地点点头，之后对你开了口。{/n}“为了表达我们对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝最崇高的敬意，请允许我献给您一件来自伊雷比斯氏族的小小圣物，愿它能忠实地为您服务。”

languages.text: {n}Xioni berührt leicht die Handfläche ihres Gatten, nickt ihm aufmunternd zu und spricht dann dich an:{/n} "Als Zeichen unserer großen Verehrung der Dynastie Valancius möchte ich Euch ein bescheidenes Familienrelikt des Erebis-Clans überreichen. Möge es Euch treue Dienste leisten."
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you:{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for the von Valancius dynasty, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xioni berührt leicht die Handfläche ihres Gatten, nickt ihm aufmunternd zu und spricht dann dich an:{/n} "Als Zeichen unserer großen Verehrung der Dynastie Valancius möchte ich Euch ein bescheidenes Familienrelikt des Erebis-Clans überreichen. Möge es Euch treue Dienste leisten."

languages.text: {n}Xioni, kocasının avcuna hafifçe dokunarak onu başıyla güven verici bir şekilde onaylıyor. Ardından seninle konuşuyor.{/n} "Von Valancius hanedanlığına karşı muazzam hürmetimizin bir simgesi olarak müsaadenizle size Erebis klanına ait mütevazı bir aile yadigârını takdim etmek istiyorum. Size sadakatle hizmet etsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni touches her husband's palm ever so slightly, gives him a reassuring nod, then addresses you:{/n} "As a token of our greatest reverence for the von Valancius dynasty, allow me to present you with a modest family relic of the Erebis clan. May it serve you faithfully."
